newsletter.subject: News from {{group}}
newsletter.intro: Here are some updates from your community.
newsletter.needs_header: ðŸ™‹ Can you help with this?
newsletter.cta_main: EXPLORE THE LATEST OFFERS AND NEEDS
newsletter.cta_secondary: Have a product or skill to offer? Post it
newsletter.balance_advice_positive: A positive balance means you have given more than you have received. Consider using it!
newsletter.balance_advice_negative: A negative balance is not a problem; it simply means you have received more than you have given. Try to balance it when you can.
newsletter.balance_advice_balanced: A balance close to zero means you have given and received in a balanced way.
newsletter.activity_count_one: You made one transfer this past month.
newsletter.activity_count_other: You made {{count}} transfers this past month.
newsletter.alert_no_offers_negative_text: You have no offers published. Surely you have a skill or service that could be useful to the community. Posting your offers can help you use your balance.
newsletter.alert_no_needs_positive_text: You have a positive balance and no needs published. Think about what you might need and publish it so other members can connect with you.
newsletter.alert_no_offers_text: You have no offers published. Surely you have a skill or service that could be useful to the community.
newsletter.alert_no_needs_text: You have no needs published. Publishing your needs helps other members connect with you.
newsletter.alert_no_image_title: Put a face to your profile
newsletter.alert_no_image_text: A profile picture helps other members recognize you and builds more trust.
newsletter.alert_no_bio_text: A short description on your profile helps the community get to know you better.
newsletter.alert_no_location_text: If you add your location to your profile, other members will know where you are and it will be easier to connect. It doesn't need to be very precise.
newsletter.alert_expired_offers_text: You have {{count}} expired offers and they are no longer visible to other members. Update them if you still want to offer them, or hide them if they are no longer valid.
newsletter.stats_title: Activity in {{group}} over the last month
newsletter.footer_reason: You are receiving this email because you are subscribed to the newsletter of {{group}} in {{appName}}.

notifications.post_expired_body: Your {{type}} '{{excerpt}}' has expired and is hidden now, but you can reactivate it.
notifications.member_expired_posts_counts_sentence: You have expired {{counts}} more to review.
notifications.member_expired_posts_body: Your {{type}} "{{excerpt}}" was hidden {{time, relativetime}}. Extend it to make it visible again.{{countsSentence}}
notifications.transfer_pending_body: {{sender}} requested {{amount}}. Please accept or reject it as soon as possible.
notifications.transfer_rejected_body: {{name}} rejected a transfer of {{amount}} and it won't be applied.
notifications.transfer_still_pending_body: Transfer of {{amount}} to {{name}} is still pending after {{ duration, duration }}. Please accept or reject it as soon as possible.
notifications.post_expires_soon_body: Extend your {{type}} '{{excerpt}}' to keep it visible to others.
notifications.welcome_new_member_body: Hi {{name}}, your account is now active! Start exploring offers and needs in your community. Happy exchange!
notifications.member_no_offers_body: Create one to help others and move your balance of {{balance}} forward. What can you offer?
notifications.member_no_needs_body: Post a need to help others connect with you and use your balance. What do you need?

emails.safely_ignore: If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it.
emails.reason_active_member: You are receiving this email as an active member of {{groupName}} on {{appName}}.
emails.validate_email_subject: Confirm your email and sign up to {{name}}
emails.validate_email_text: Please click the button below to confirm your email address. You will be directed to the sign up form for {{name}}.
emails.validate_email_reason: You are receiving this email because an account is being created with this email address on {{appName}}.
emails.reset_password_text: Please click the button below to reset your password. Then you will be able to choose a new password for your account on {{name}}.
emails.reset_password_reason: You are receiving this email because a password reset has been requested for this email address on {{appName}}.
emails.welcome_text_1: You have been accepted as a member of {{groupName}}. Your account number is {{code}}.
emails.welcome_text_2: You can now sign in to {{appName}} to explore other members in your community and their offers and needs. Please take a minute to complete your profile with relevant contact details, description and photo. You can also complete your offers and needs with a detailed description and images.
emails.transfer_pending_text: {{sender}} has requested a transfer of {{amount}}. Please accept or reject it.
emails.transfer_pending_subtext: It is very important to keep the balances up to date. Please take action as soon as possible.
emails.transfer_rejected_subtext: If you think this is a mistake, please contact them to accept a new transfer, or contact the community administrators if necessary.
emails.member_requested_subtext: Please review the request and accept or delete it as soon as possible.
emails.reason_admin: You are receiving this email as an administrator of {{groupName}} on {{appName}}.
emails.group_activated_text: Congratulations! Your community {{groupName}} has been activated and is ready to go.
emails.group_activated_subtext: You can now sign in to {{appName}} and configure the community and currency settings, including allowed transfer methods, credit limits, and categories for offers and needs. After that, invite members and start trading. Good luck making your community grow!
emails._comment: Superadmin emails are always sent in English. No need to translate the following keys:
emails.reason_superadmin: You are receiving this email as the server administrator of {{appName}}.
emails.group_requested_text: A new community {{groupName}} has just been requested.
emails.group_requested_subtext: Please review the request and activate or delete the community as soon as possible.
